title: Magic Island: Music For Balearic People Vol 5 (Mixed & Compi
description:
Magic Island: Music For Balearic People Vol 5 (Mixed & Compiled by Roger Shah) 

       Balearic, Downtempo, Trance, Progressive House | Magic Island Records 

               320 kbps | MP3 | unmixed | 2014 | 05:23:54 | 743 Mb



Featuring 30 new tracks, each expounding these ethics in their own way, the album includes a mass of new studio material from Roger himself, as well as many from his best know sobriquets and collaboration projects. In and amongst them is music from High Noon At Salinas, Black Pearl, Global Experience, Sunlounger as well as tracks from Carla Werner, PM Attitude and a whole host of others. 'None of the Magic Island albums are 'Ibiza compilations', says Roger Shah, clarifying the ever present misconception of his estimable series. 'To me Balearica is a state of mind, not a place; 'Magic Island' is a metaphor - not for the White Isle itself, but everything its represents worldwide. Sun, sea, sounds, vacations, those types of things.
